 Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)
statement:
dral1.1 $e |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
drnf2 $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( F/ z ph <-> F/ z ps ) ) $.
